name: Logistics Boy
description:
An action game inspired by classic LCD electronic games.

Made for Ludum Dare48 JAM

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

****

Controls:  Arrows - Move / Z - Action

It's all in a days work for Logistics Boy!

Help him finish his shift and make a delivery he won't soon forget!

****

Features two difficulty modes and a quirky old school-handheld experience!

Playable on browser and as a Windows .EXE (also runs on Linux using WINE).

Mobile/touch-controls also available. Try it on your phone for an actual handheld-feel!

****

Just a little note for hardware-purists: This is more of a homage/“parody” than an actual attempt at operating in exactly the same limitations as real vintage LCD-games.

Nevertheless, we hope you enjoy playing it!
